name: Fault
ability: Each night, mark a player. The next night, that player dies. The night after that, that player is revived as a Minion.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player and mark them with 'Marked'. If a player has 'Dies Tonight', they die. Remove the 'Dies Tonight' reminder and add the 'Revives as Minion' reminder. If a player has 'Revives as Minion', revive them and show them a Minion token, then mark them as a Minion in the Grimoire.
flavor: This is my hole. It was made for me.
